website_summaries.verdict: Some devotees love this deodorant so much they buy it in bulk. Gentle on the skin, gentle on your clothes. Not gentle on the wallet, but many say it's worth it.
pros: Effective, even on the hottest of days
cons: Takes a long time to dry

customer_reviews.title: I'm still smelly
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many deodorants because I'm a sweater-- This goes on very wet, which isn't the best feeling but dries pretty quick. It's just ok.. I still smell at the end of the day. The search continues.
customer_reviews.author: Csaw

customer_reviews.title: BEST DEO EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: O.M.G!!! THE BEST DEODORANT EVER!!!!!! I’ve tried several brands before (Believe me, I’ve tried everything) and they have been nothing but a disappointment. I was so unpleased with other brands to the point where I was using straight lime juice as my deo. I decided to give this one a try and it’s everything I’ve ever been looking for. Every penny spent is worth it. The scent is pleasant and not overpowering and you smell good for 24hrs. Highly highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Niraj prasai

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Deodorant-Worth the Money!!
customer_reviews.text: This frequently sells out in the department stores. It smells lovely, works well and never turns a weird odor at the end of the day. It's better than the Donna Karan AND Fresh brands!
customer_reviews.author: KB123

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical but now satisfied :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Lancôme Bocage roll on and I was a little skeptical just because you never know how one personal hygiene product will work for YOU but I had high hopes and this definitely met them. It has a nice light scent (think a little powdery or babyish/slightly floral), it’s not too thick and keeps me smelling fresh all day. It is a liquid so obviously it takes a bit to dry but other than that I love it. (I did also detox my armpits by using the Aztec Clay mask and a little ACV before I started using this and it definitely made a difference.)
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good; recommended
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for over a year; last about 4 to 6 weeks. Unisex. Dries quickly. No white. I like it a lot. I also use other Clarins products (face cream, serum, cream eye shadow, eye cream ---- all GOOD).
customer_reviews.author: R BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in a pinch when I ran out--usually I order from Clarins directly or get them from Nordstrom. These deodorants are counterfeit. They have totally different packaging than the ones from Clarins and Nordstrom, and sting when applied to my underarm area unlike the original. Also don't have the same lovely scent. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J.

customer_reviews.title: Best deodorant in the world!!!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this Clarins deodorant for years and it’s the best deodorant EVER. Lucky I could order it through amazon as they don’t sell it where I live now in Singapore.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline G

customer_reviews.title: It last a while
customer_reviews.text: It keeps me fresh under my arms, and doesn't leave white deodorant stains . I've been using this for over over 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Best deodorant!
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant really work! I always had a problem because none of other deodorant ever work on me! Until I discover Clarins deodorant! It really keep me dry all day! Finally found a great deodorant!Than you Clarins!!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: I suffer no more, buy this, it works!
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered with body odor for a long time and I tried everything, natural deodorants, chlorophyll, probiotics bit nothing would help my sensitive overpowering armpits... I stumbled on this Clarins in a forum, and everyone said the smell is great, no alcohol, etc... I can tell you it works! Finally I can go all day without any problem. I even smelled my shirt the next day from wearing it all day and no smell. It does have a light fragrance but it’s very pleasant, and it does not sting. Do yourself a favor and get this, and be confident and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: Cap stuck unable to use.
customer_reviews.text: Had to pry open with a screwdriver and spillled most of it... Ridiculous! Never had a problem opening deodorant before. Sent back probably really old.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fried

customer_reviews.title: Super allergic very happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: I am super allergic to everything. I can only wear Almay, nothing else. Recently, Almay changed their packaging and it dispenses too much gel. That left all my clothes with white residue that won't wash off. I was in the market for something new. I am a 30 year user of Clarins gentle day cream and I noticed this deodorant. It takes 28 days for me to start having an allergic reaction. I am on day 15 and no signs of any hives yet. I absolutely love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: E. Pretorius

customer_reviews.title: Deodorant bottle arrived unsealed.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when my bottle arrived it was unsealed , it did not look used ,still very uncomfortable and disappointing. . The deodorant itself is perfect .
customer_reviews.author: rambam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deodorant
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product - it dries almost instantly, keeps me feeling fresh all day and is perfect for travel due to its compact size. I have sensitive skin and it's very gentle as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. London

customer_reviews.title: Do not apply after shaving it burns a little bit, I wait for at least 30 minuets.
customer_reviews.text: One of Best products I have used, I have been using this for three years and will continue to use it. Smells good, last for long time no powder marks on your clothes, I don’t like that it’s not available at the stores anymore and also it’s a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Hind Mekha

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting  deodorant
customer_reviews.text: The little box was smashed but the deodorant didn’t break
customer_reviews.author: Elen Amirbekyan

customer_reviews.title: It smells nice too.
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic too most deodorants. I finally found one that does not cause itching and irritation. It smells nice too.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Great deodorant, though pricy 😉
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best. Been using this deodorant for 3 years now. Even though it’s a bit pricy, I couldn’t find a substitute for it.
customer_reviews.author: Saghi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pleasant scent, and it works !!!
customer_reviews.text: Best deodoant I have ever used! Now will share with my sister!
customer_reviews.author: Cat who loves shoes

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I COULDN'T FIND A DEODORANT THAT TRULY WORKED -THIS DOES! DON'T HESITATE - JUST BUY.
customer_reviews.author: SHayes

customer_reviews.title: Best Deodorant ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best deodorant on the market. It has a very mild, pleasant scent, and it's not oily or greasy.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Will get another one! ;)
customer_reviews.text: Great deodorant! In love with its scent and its long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Kliveta

customer_reviews.title: That it keep hou dry no sweat
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant smells great and keep me dry even on my long workouts. Great confidence
customer_reviews.author: Becky Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me dry and odor free all day and smells very soft and fantastic. I love it so much my sister now uses it and loves it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha L. Barber

customer_reviews.title: Love it! My fav deodorant for past a few years.
customer_reviews.text: Cant change it to anything. It is great after wax or shave. Doesnt tingle. It has pleasant aroma, works whole day, doesnt leave this white marks while you are getting into your fancy clothes. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Nina G Avakyan

customer_reviews.title: smells great, works great
customer_reviews.text: was allergic to this product... smells great, works great, but my body chemistry didn't like it...
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the smell and has a lot alcohol
customer_reviews.author: Poly

customer_reviews.title: Best deodorant ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have a funny relationship with deodorants, most make my underarms itch, and the ones that don't, work for a week and then stop. My mom got a sample of this and brought it home, I tried it and figured it'd be the same as the others but no. I've been using it for about 4 months now with no issues. It smells greats and keeps you dry and fresh for well over 24 hours. It's absolutely essential for me, and honestly, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rockharpered

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It works-- Best deodorant I have ever used. In fact I'm not sure I've ever had one that works before this one!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell!!!!! And the quality!!!! Highly recommended!!! Finally I found that's suitable for me and my skin! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Santa

customer_reviews.title: Have to reapply  after sport. Doesn’t last all day. Nice smell.
customer_reviews.text: Stays wet for a while. Smells nice. Last up to 6-7 hours if you don’t do any sport,
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Sticky
customer_reviews.text: Sticky. Works well but need to use hair dryer to really dry it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren.

customer_reviews.title: Like product very much
customer_reviews.text: Like product very much. Works well and is gentle at the same time. Also roll on application is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Film Buff

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting deodorant-great for summer months
customer_reviews.text: It WORKS during the hot beach days all day long. I only use it when it's going to be very hot or when I'm at the beach all day, but it definitely works.
customer_reviews.author: TNichelle

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and the best deodorant
customer_reviews.text: Great smell and the best deodorant. I tried others over the years, but I always come back to this one.
customer_reviews.author: MS

product_meta.title: Clarins Roll On Deodorant - 1.7 Fluid Ounce
product_meta.description: Clarins Gentle Care Roll On Deodorant - 1.7 Fluid Ounce Anti-Perspirant & Deodorant. This delicately scented, alcohol-free deodorant with Buchu Leaf, Witch Hazel and Rosemary extracts, decreases perspiration to keep underarms dry and odor-free for hours. Non irritating formula is gentle enough for the most sensitive skin, even after shaving.
feature_bullets: Helps soothe and soften yours kin

specifications.Manufacturer: Camrose Trading Inc. DBA Fragrance Express - DROPSHIP
